And that's why we believe so strongly here at retirement income strategies on comprehensive retirement planning and and that's what makes us unique in fact there's there's three things that really make us unique
The first thing is that we work with people that are at or near retirement right and we're we're no longer generalists we work specifically with people who are within five to ten years of retirement than they are now mostly focused on preservation and income
And the second thing that makes us unique is that we do customized planning so it's it's cost them to your situation we spend time with you learning what you want to accomplish what what are your concerns how much income do you need specifically ah how long does that half the last what are your biggest goals objectives and mostly concerns

Company or anyone brokerage firm or any one insurance company I don't have a sales manager telling me
